text: Beyoncé The Ultimate Performer Cover Singel Beyoncé Released November 24 2006r. Genre R&B; Beyoncé chronology B'Day (2006r.) Beyoncé The Ultimate Performer B'Day Deluxe Edition (2007r.) Beyoncé The Ultimate Performer is a DVD by R&B; artist Beyoncé Knowles. It was released in the US on November 24, 2006. It features some of her exclusive footages in France, Japan, United Kingdom, New York among other places during her worldwide tour, the makings and music video.Walmart DVD InfoAmazon DVD Info ==Tracklisting== *Footage *Making of Ring the Alarm *Ring the Alarm – Music Video ==References== Category:Beyoncé albums
title: Beyoncé The Ultimate Performer
